titleStmt.title: By the maior to the aldermen of the ward of [blank] : whereas divers good laws have formerly been made, and are still in force against several wicked and disorderly practices ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).

notesStmt.note: Second part of title taken from first line of text.
Order against profamation of the Lord's Day.
"Given this eighth day of November 1687"-- p. 4.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
